data.title: Animated TV Shows you hate
data.meta_description:
I hate Dora the Explorer, Sanjay and Craig, Lalaloopsy, and PEPPA F*CKING PIG. I have not seen any Teen Cartoons yet.

What are your worst Animated TV Shows?
data.text:
Boo Diddly

Shine Sprite

Jun 6, 2014

#1

I hate Dora the Explorer, Sanjay and Craig, Lalaloopsy, and PEPPA F*CKING PIG. I have not seen any Teen Cartoons yet.

What are your worst Animated TV Shows?

Lario

Seems so long ago.

Jun 6, 2014

#2

inb4 TheMysteriousMrEnter wankery

I honestly haven't paid much attention to shows I don't like to give them any decent criticisms.

Star Spirit

The Adventures of Paddy the Pelican

Battletoads

Brickleberry

The Brothers Flub

The Brothers Grunt

Bucky and Pepito

Clutch Cargo

Captain Fathom

Family Dog

Li'l Bush

Stressed Eric

MoonAge

King Bowser

And how is Brickleberry one of the worst shows ever?

Yes, it tries to be offensive without also trying to be funny, but I wouldn't put it on the same list as Allen Gregory.

New Spongebob.

I've watched seasons 1-3 recently, and I find it tragic how it descended into this steaming pile of boring, mean-spirited, gross-out, psychological tormenting. It's disturbing on so much levels.

Lario said:

I honestly haven't paid much attention to shows I don't like to give them any decent criticisms.

Looking back at this post, I remember having a big dislike for that George of the Jungle cartoon that aired on Cartoon Network nearly a decade ago, but I never actually watched it. I guess it'd be one of the worst up until Johnny Test arrived.
